channel.title: Should i change kingshits source?
channel.description:
Well i been thinking about my server kingshits and i want to make it lot better but its cheezscpe 80 source and you cant do anything without getting pked shell i change the source to a testscape based so you have all what you want to do? 1.train your combat skills(all) 2.making money 3.pk in the wildy 4.So you have to go all over the server to make money not just like in one little spot
Shell i chnge it like that :confused:
